short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Pony Ride: By Tatsuro Kiuchi (木内達朗)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The artist reminisces about his first experience riding a pony as a child, imprinting a fond memory that made him fall in love with horses. His connection to horses remains strong as he visits a stable near his studio.

Tatsuro Kiuchi (he/him) is a Tokyo-based illustrator and painter born in Tokyo, Japan. A biology major and graduate of International Christian University in Tokyo, he switched to an art career after graduating with distinction from ArtCenter College of Design in Pasadena, California.
